briefdescription.para: This flag means that the list being enumerated is a copy that may become out of date.

detaileddescription.para: Use this flag if you don't care whether or not other threads change the list's contents. The listener may make changes to the list at any time but those changes will not be reflected in the enumeration sequence.

briefdescription.para: This flag means that the list is protected from changes by other threads during the enumeration.

detaileddescription.para: Use this flag if you need to be certain that the contents of the list are not changed during enumeration. Note that all other threads will block until the enumeration is complete. Furthermore, changes made to list from the listener are not permitted until the listener has received the onEnumerationEnd notification.

briefdescription.para: The name of the media list.
The type of media list (eg "simple").
Returns the length of the list.
Is the list empty?
Get a media item in the list by guid.

simplesect.para: Media item with the requested guid or null if not found

briefdescription.para: Get a media item in the list by index.

simplesect.para: Media item with the requested index

memberdef.argsstring: (in sbIMediaListEnumerationListener aEnumerationListener,[optional] in unsigned short aEnumerationType)
memberdef.name: enumerateAllItems

briefdescription.para: Enumerate all items in the list.

detaileddescription.para: Do not use ENUMERATIONTYPE_LOCKING unless you fit a usage scenario described in the ENUMERATIONTYPE_LOCKING constant documentation.

parameterdescription.para: - One of the ENUMERATIONTYPE values above. Default is ENUMERATIONTYPE_SNAPSHOT.

memberdef.argsstring: (in AString aPropertyID, in AString aPropertyValue, in sbIMediaListEnumerationListener aEnumerationListener,[optional] in unsigned short aEnumerationType)
memberdef.name: enumerateItemsByProperty

briefdescription.para: Enumerate the media items in the list that match a given property ID and value.

parameterdescription.para: aEnumerationType - One of the ENUMERATIONTYPE values above. Default is <ENUMERATIONTYPE_SNAPSHOT>.

memberdef.argsstring: (in sbIPropertyArray aProperties, in sbIMediaListEnumerationListener aEnumerationListener,[optional] in unsigned short aEnumerationType)
memberdef.name: enumerateItemsByProperties

briefdescription.para: Enumerate the media items that match a list of property IDs and values.

parameterdescription.para: - A list of property ID/value pairs.
aEnumerationType - One of the ENUMERATIONTYPE values above.

memberdef.argsstring: (in sbIMediaItem aMediaItem, in unsigned long aStartFrom)
memberdef.name: indexOf

briefdescription.para: Get the first index of a media item int he list.

simplesect.para: The index that the media item was first found at, or throws NS_ERROR_NOT_AVAILABLE if not found

memberdef.argsstring: (in sbIMediaItem aMediaItem, in unsigned long aStartFrom)
memberdef.name: lastIndexOf

briefdescription.para: Get the last index of a media item int he list.

simplesect.para: The index that the media item was last found at, or throws NS_ERROR_NOT_AVAILABLE if not found

briefdescription.para: Check if the list contains a media item.

simplesect.para: true if the media item was found, false if it was not found

briefdescription.para: Add a media item to this list.

parameterdescription.para: The media item to add to the list

briefdescription.para: Add the contents of a media list to this list.

parameterdescription.para: The media list whose contents are to be added

briefdescription.para: Adds media items suppled by the provided enumerator.
Remove the first occurrence of the given media item from the list.
Remove a media item from the list by index.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the item to remove

briefdescription.para: Removed media items suppled by the provided enumerator.
Clear the list.

memberdef.argsstring: (in sbIMediaListListener aListener,[optional] in boolean aOwnsWeak,[optional] in unsigned long aFlags,[optional] in sbIPropertyArray aPropertyFilter)
memberdef.name: addListener

briefdescription.para: Add a listener to this media list.

parameterdescription.para: If set to false, the media list will hold a strong reference to |aListener|. If set to true and |aListener| supports the nsIWeakReference interface, a weak reference will be held. Otherwise an error will be returned.
A bit mask made up the LISTENER_FLAGS_ constants above. Use this to filter out unwanted notifications. If not set, this will default to LISTENER_FLAGS_ALL

If this argument is specified, the onItemUpdated notification will only be sent for updates to any of the properties specified in the array. Note that the values of the properties in the array are ignored. If not set or null, no filtering will be applied.

briefdescription.para: Remove a listener from this media list.
Create a new view for this list.

parameterdescription.para: Optional initial state for the view

briefdescription.para: Runs the given callback with the given user data in batch mode.
A brief description of the contents of this interface.

detaileddescription.para: A detailed description of this interface
